Alliance's Computer/Vamprah::

"Energy's level: 0... Subject's Reparation System is running... 
Stasis Lock retired 80%... Subject's Energy level: 35%... Weapons's 
Energy Level: 2%" reported Alliance's computer

Vamprah continued moving.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Ok, nevermind, who needs sleep anyways?
> 
> ::Squizzy::
> 
> Squizzy smiles as Vamprah tries to open her eyes. She stops the 
power 
> feed, letting Vamprah go on her own power system.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > ::Alliance's Computer/Vamprah::
> > 
> > "Stasis Lock retired 70%, Spark's Status: Stable..." Reported 
> > Alliance's computer.
> >

slowly.
